properties.Name: CustomerOrganizationCriteria
properties.Description:
Organization Criteria are a means to identify what 'positions' or 'organizational responsibilities' a customer has.   

An organization can be defined for both professional organizations ('Employment') or the family organization ("Housewife")

The Organization Criteria Type is the larger classification to which the Organization Criteria belongs.

The following are examples:

Organization Criteria:   "Housewife"
Organization Criteria Type:  "Family"

Organization Criteria:   "Manager"
Organization Criteria Type:  "Employment"

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of Organization Criteria to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: OrganizationCriteriaId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of an Organization Criteria.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated data is effective or 'as-of'.

Columns.Name: CustomerOrganizationCriteriaNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information related to Customer Organization Criteria.

Properties.Description:
Organization Criteria are a means to identify what 'positions' or 'organizational responsibilities' a customer has.   

An organization can be defined for both professional organizations ('Employment') or the family organization ("Housewife")

The Organization Criteria Type is the larger classification to which the Organization Criteria belongs.

The following are examples:

Organization Criteria:   "Housewife"
Organization Criteria Type:  "Family"

Organization Criteria:   "Manager"
Organization Criteria Type:  "Employment"

Each organization will identify, define and track a specific set of Organization Criteria to gather information about, define consumers and make decisions.
